languages.text: {n}Префект пролистывает несколько страниц в папке.{/n} "Суд также принимает к сведению тлетворные последствия правления Вольного Торговца отданными {mf|ему|ей} на попечение слугами Императора. После прибытия с Тассеры Вольный Торговец исполнил{mf||а} свой долг, рассудив нескольких подданных в стенах этого священного зала..." {n}Префект берет лист с записями и кривится.{/n}

{n}The prefect leafs through a few pages in a folder.{/n} "The court also takes note of the pernicious effects of the Rogue Trader's handling of the Emperor's servants entrusted to {mf|his|her} authority. Since arriving from Thassera, the Rogue Trader has done {mf|his|her} duty by passing judgement on several subjects within the walls of this hallowed hall..." {n}The prefect picks up the sheet of notes and wrinkles her nose.{/n}

После прибытия с Тассеры Вольный Торговец исполнил{mf||а} свой долг, рассудив нескольких подданных в стенах этого священного зала..." {n}Префект берет лист с записями и кривится.{/n}

Since arriving from Thassera, the Rogue Trader has done {mf|his|her} duty by passing judgement on several subjects within the walls of this hallowed hall..." {n}The prefect picks up the sheet of notes and sneers.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Präfektin blättert in einem Ordner.{/n} "Ferner nimmt das Gericht die schädlichen Auswirkungen des Umgangs mit den Untertanen des Imperators seitens {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} zu Kenntnis, die {mf|seiner|ihrer} Autorität unterstellt sind. Seit {mf|seiner|ihrer} Rückkehr von Thassera hat {mf|der Freihändler seine|die Freihändlerin ihre} Pflicht erfüllt und in dieser heiligen Halle Gericht über mehrere Subjekte gehalten ..." {n}Die Präfektin nimmt das Blatt mit Notizen und rümpft die Nase.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The prefect leafs through a few pages in a folder.{/n} "The court also takes note of the pernicious effects of the Rogue Trader's handling of the Emperor's servants entrusted to {mf|his|her} authority. Since arriving from Thassera, the Rogue Trader has done {mf|his|her} duty by passing judgement on several subjects within the walls of this hallowed hall..." {n}The prefect picks up the sheet of notes and wrinkles her nose.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Präfektin blättert in einem Ordner.{/n} "Ferner nimmt das Gericht die schädlichen Auswirkungen des Umgangs mit den Untertanen des Imperators seitens {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} zu Kenntnis, die {mf|seiner|ihrer} Autorität unterstellt sind. Seit {mf|seiner|ihrer} Rückkehr von Thassera hat {mf|der Freihändler seine|die Freihändlerin ihre} Pflicht erfüllt und in dieser heiligen Halle Gericht über mehrere Subjekte gehalten ..." {n}Die Präfektin nimmt das Blatt mit Notizen und rümpft die Nase.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La préfète feuillette les pages d'un dossier.{/n} « La cour prend également note des effets pernicieux de la manière dont {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} a traité les serviteurs de l'Empereur placés sous sa tutelle. Depuis son arrivée sur Thassera, {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} a fait son devoir en jugeant plusieurs sujets entre les murs de cette sainte salle... » {n}La préfète s'empare de la feuille de notes en fronçant le nez.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The prefect leafs through a few pages in a folder.{/n} "The court also takes note of the pernicious effects of the Rogue Trader's handling of the Emperor's servants entrusted to {mf|his|her} authority. Since arriving from Thassera, the Rogue Trader has done {mf|his|her} duty by passing judgement on several subjects within the walls of this hallowed hall..." {n}The prefect picks up the sheet of notes and wrinkles her nose.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La préfète feuillette les pages d'un dossier.{/n} « La cour prend également note des effets pernicieux de la manière dont {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} a traité les serviteurs de l'Empereur placés sous sa tutelle. Depuis son arrivée sur Thassera, {mf|le libre-marchand|la |libre-marchande} a fait son devoir en jugeant plusieurs sujets entre les murs de cette sainte salle... » {n}La préfète s'empare de la feuille de notes en fronçant le nez.{/n}

languages.text: {n}行政官再次翻起了卷宗。{/n}“法庭还注意到，行商浪人滥用神皇赐予{mf|他|她}的权力，在解决神皇仆从的相关事务时，造成了相当有害的影响。行商浪人离开塔瑟拉之后，履行了自己的职责，在这座神圣的厅堂里对部分案件做出了裁决……”{n}行政官拿起几张羊皮纸，皱了皱鼻子。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The prefect leafs through a few pages in a folder.{/n} "The court also takes note of the pernicious effects of the Rogue Trader's handling of the Emperor's servants entrusted to {mf|his|her} authority. Since arriving from Thassera, the Rogue Trader has done {mf|his|her} duty by passing judgement on several subjects within the walls of this hallowed hall..." {n}The prefect picks up the sheet of notes and wrinkles her nose.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}行政官再次翻起了卷宗。{/n}“法庭还注意到，行商浪人滥用神皇赐予{mf|他|她}的权力，在解决神皇仆从的相关事务时，造成了相当有害的影响。行商浪人离开塔瑟拉之后，履行了自己的职责，在这座神圣的厅堂里对部分案件做出了裁决……”{n}行政官拿起几张羊皮纸，皱了皱鼻子。{/n}

languages.text: {n}La prefecta hojea las páginas de una carpeta.{/n} «El tribunal también toma nota de los efectos nocivos del tratamiento de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente hacia los sirvientes confiados a su autoridad. Desde su llegada a Thassera, {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente ha cumplido con su deber juzgando a varios súbditos entre los muros de este bendito Palacio...». {n}La prefecta coge una lista de notas y arruga la nariz.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The prefect leafs through a few pages in a folder.{/n} "The court also takes note of the pernicious effects of the Rogue Trader's handling of the Emperor's servants entrusted to {mf|his|her} authority. Since arriving from Thassera, the Rogue Trader has done {mf|his|her} duty by passing judgement on several subjects within the walls of this hallowed hall..." {n}The prefect picks up the sheet of notes and wrinkles her nose.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La prefecta hojea las páginas de una carpeta.{/n} «El tribunal también toma nota de los efectos nocivos del tratamiento de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente hacia los sirvientes confiados a su autoridad. Desde su llegada a Thassera, {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente ha cumplido con su deber juzgando a varios súbditos entre los muros de este bendito Palacio...». {n}La prefecta coge una lista de notas y arruga la nariz.{/n}

languages.text: {n}総監はフォルダーの中の数ページをめくった。{/n}「裁判所はまた、ローグトレーダーに委ねられた皇帝陛下のしもべたちに対する扱いが、いかに有害な影響をもたらしたかにも注目しています。タッセーラから到着して以来、ローグトレーダーはこの神聖なる法廷の中で複数の被告に対して裁きを下してきました…」{n}総監はメモを手に取り、鼻に皺を寄せた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The prefect leafs through a few pages in a folder.{/n} "The court also takes note of the pernicious effects of the Rogue Trader's handling of the Emperor's servants entrusted to {mf|his|her} authority. Since arriving from Thassera, the Rogue Trader has done {mf|his|her} duty by passing judgement on several subjects within the walls of this hallowed hall..." {n}The prefect picks up the sheet of notes and wrinkles her nose.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}総監はフォルダーの中の数ページをめくった。{/n}「裁判所はまた、ローグトレーダーに委ねられた皇帝陛下のしもべたちに対する扱いが、いかに有害な影響をもたらしたかにも注目しています。タッセーラから到着して以来、ローグトレーダーはこの神聖なる法廷の中で複数の被告に対して裁きを下してきました…」{n}総監はメモを手に取り、鼻に皺を寄せた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Prefekt, bir dosyanın sayfalarını karıştırıyor.{/n} "Hür Tacir'in, emri altındaki İmparator kullarına muamelesinden doğan zararlar da mahkemenin dikkatinden kaçmış değildir. Hür Tacir, Thassera'dan gelişinden beri bu kutsal salonun duvarları arasında çok sayıda tebaanın duruşmasına hâkimlik yaparak görevini ifa etmiş..." {n}Prefekt, not kâğıtlarını alıp burnunu kıvırıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The prefect leafs through a few pages in a folder.{/n} "The court also takes note of the pernicious effects of the Rogue Trader's handling of the Emperor's servants entrusted to {mf|his|her} authority. Since arriving from Thassera, the Rogue Trader has done {mf|his|her} duty by passing judgement on several subjects within the walls of this hallowed hall..." {n}The prefect picks up the sheet of notes and wrinkles her nose.{/n}

Hür Tacir, Thassera'dan gelişinden beri bu kutsal salonun duvarları arasında çok sayıda tebaanın duruşmasına hâkimlik yaparak görevini ifa etmiş..." {n}Prefekt not kâğıtlarını alıp burnunu kıvırıyor.{/n}
